short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension helps to keep track of the most dominant stream in the online gaming community while browsing twitch.tv

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The purpose of the Dr Disrespect Chrome Extension is to help people keep track of when the two time is streaming while browsing twitch.tv.
The extension adds a new section to the left side of the twitch app - MAIN CHANNEL. Every three minutes, or on page reload, the extension checks if the Doc is streaming on YouTube. If he is - the extension shows that, just like on the screenshot.
I developed this extension because I love watching Doctor's streams and I also like browsing twitch. I hope somebody else finds it useful :)
The extension is safe and secure. It does not steal or collect any of your data. You can check the source code here - https://github.com/bashvlas/drdisrespect
